price: 74 Satan seul refusa par orgueil de se prosterner, se comportant en impie.
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa is'takbara wakāna mina al-kāfirīna
